alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Carroll and northeastern Grayson Counties and the City of Galax through 300 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fries, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Galax... Fries... Byllesby... Spring Valley... and Woodlawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
